The fairies protect our employees.
Everything will be peaceful while you are under the fairies’ care.

His stomach and face were ripped off, and his eyeballs and organs were damaged as if they were eaten by something.
Meanwhile, the fairies had someone’s blood and flesh smeared all over their mouths.

The 3rd Walpurgis Night - Into a Certain Library's Book
The 3rd Walpurgis Night - Into a Certain Library's Book
[The 3rd Walpurgis Night - Into a Certain Library's Book] unlocks regardless of your progress in the Main Story. Enter via the event banner on the Window or the Driverside tabs.
Event Period
The duration of The 3rd Walpurgis Night - Into a Certain Library's Book event is shown here. During the event, complete Missions for Easy and Hard difficulty event Encounters and claim their rewards.
Easy Difficulty Encounter

Select the door to begin the Easy difficulty Encounter.
During the 3rd Walpurgis Night Event period, the Encounter consumes an Enkephalin Module upon entry.
On Easy difficulty, any Deployed Identities under Level 45 will be raised to Level 45.
Also, any Deployed Identities under Tier 3 Uptie Level will be raised to Tier 3 Uptie Level.
However, your current E.G.O Threadspinning Tiers will be reflected.
Hard Difficulty Encounter

Clearing the Easy difficulty Encounter unlocks the Hard difficulty.
In Hard difficulty, your Identities' current Levels, Uptie Tiers, and E.G.O Threadspinning Tiers will be reflected.
Librarian of History Effect

The #1 Sinner to be Deployed in the Teams menu will be imbued with the 'Librarian of History' effect. The effects of 'Librarian of History' differs between Easy/Hard difficulties. Sinner imbued with this effect will gain more Slots and various other beneficial effects.
Missions
You can enter the [Missions] page, where you can view the list of Missions to be completed during the Encounter and their rewards.
You can view the Reward Exchange period in the [Missions] page.
Easy difficulty and Hard difficulty each has different sets of Missions to complete.
Complete these Missions and claim various rewards from the [Missions] page.

Even after the event fully ends, you will be able to experience the 'The 3rd Walpurgis Night - Into a Certain Library's Book' combat Encounters and view its story anytime at the Driverside and Theater - [Detour Tales].
Event Closed
